pushpin_map_caption = Location in Tunisia | pushpin_label_position = bottom | footnotes = }} Mateur ( ) is a town in northern Tunisia, located 66 kilometers northwest of Tunis. Located in the southwest of the governorate of Bizerte, Mateur is the capital of a delegation with 47,562 inhabitants while the city itself had 34,010 inhabitants in 2014. == References == Category:Towns in Tunisia
